title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 6.6? Click Here!
body:
>#***Update on Avast users, March 24th:***

>Just wanted to follow-up to everyone that Avast was notified of the false positive on their end.  They were able to identify the problem due to everyone's reports (If you sent this over to them, awesome!) and resolved the issue on their end.

>Follow the [steps from Avast](https://www.avast.com/faq.php?article=AVKB168) to allow the file:  **LoLPatcherUx.exe**  to be added to the exclusions list.  If you already encountered this issue, you may have to [allow Avast to restore the quarantined file](https://www.avast.com/false-positive-file-form.php):   **LoLPatcherUx.exe**

-----------------------------------------------

Hey everybody,

Remember everyone, there's heroes and there's Legends. Heroes get remembered, but Legends never die. Reminder to start your Legend by joining a club today!

http://i.imgur.com/1asvG6J.jpg

While you're gathering your friends and joining a club, if patching issues get in your way with 6.6, check the list below. We'll get you fixed up and ready to fight!

######Also, don't forget to execute order 66...

----------------------------------------------

> #***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

> #***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body:
If you have Avast, LoLPatcherUX.exe is detected as a virus.

Do the steps shown here:

https://gfycat.com/ShamelessShortKingbird

I don't know how Riot can possibly fix this considering the actual patcher is detected as a virus and therefore can't be patched to fix this...

Edit: Reported it as a false positive to Avast, might be the best thing to do right now

Just wanted to follow-up to everyone that Avast was notified of the false positive on their end.  They were able to identify the problem due to everyone's reports (If you sent this over to them, awesome!) and resolved the issue on their end.

Follow the [steps from Avast](https://www.avast.com/faq.php?article=AVKB168) to allow the file:  **LoLPatcherUx.exe**  to be added to the exclusions list.  If you already encountered this issue, you may have to [allow Avast to restore the quarantined file](https://www.avast.com/false-positive-file-form.php):   **LoLPatcherUx.exe**

This should get everyone into the client and back onto the Rift.  Let me know if you encounter any further issues!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eUQAfWAK,comment-id=00170006,timestamp=2016-03-25T00:21:45.590+0000)

If you already encountered this issue, you may have to [allow Avast to restore the quarantined file](https://www.avast.com/false-positive-file-form.php):   **LoLPatcherUx.exe**
> 
> This should get everyone into the client and back onto the Rift.  Let me know if you encounter any further issues!

Anytime i click the league, The logo appears as if the client is launching, then it disappears and then thats it.

No error message or anything.

Ive tried all sorts of fixes and nothing has worked

I'm having the exact same problem also. I have done file repair and it still doesn't work.

Help please. Riot support keeps signing me out almost instantly after logging into it, today I can't even log into the game at all. After reporting a suspicious player with out of date match history, even though I just played against him/her and had 4 delayed match history matches showing up in my own now. I also experienced 11-17s game-play delay/freezing on Summoner's Rift where everybody looked like they were moon walking when I tried to play with a custom team of 5, as Caitlin. I've seen 3 players now with out of date match history even though I've been with them in-game. One was a friend and two were weirdly quiet after matches but stayed in the result lobby, like they were brooding from losing or something. I tried reporting one of them to Riot support but then after I couldn't use it any more because it started logging me out instantly?????  Like 1-2 years of their matches isn't showing in their history to me, what's up with that???? I've had no issues with Riot support, game log-in, or my security until I sent that report. -.-
You have no idea how much I'm indebted to you for helping me fix this!
Avast keep blocking the update. When clicking on League it shows the logo, the little bar under it charge to more or less 1/4 and Avast block it as an infection.

You are not the only one. I have even tried to check if it is in the quarantine lists and it is not there. Avast asked me if I wanted to ignore the "virus" when I try to open it, now League Of Legends icon wont even appear -.-

I even ran a Scan over the League Of Legends "File" and avast did not find a virus, but some how finds a "virus" when I run it....

and really..... League  has worked just fine with avast before. now it does not work with or without avast.
I reinstalled avast. It is not wise this day and age to be online without some kind of virus program.
While my avast was uninstalled i also made sure that my windows firewall was turned off, so that could not be the issue either.

Riot keeps ignoring this issue. They have nothing on their pages, that they might be fixing this issue, or are even paying attention to this problem.

Right!, like I cannot even see the launcher... It pulls up the league launcher buffer icon, then just does not reappear.
Rito!!! FIX THIS!!! ASAP!!!!

You even said that avast may have white-listed the game!, do something about it then!. I am not sacking the security of my computer to play your game because you cannot talk to other companies!.

And Rito before you tell me to do things such as "Update Avast"... I have already, and is up to current date. I have restarted the computer already, and This is not the first time this has happened.


Update. I just uninstalled and tried to reinstall, I cannot even reinstall. I download the installer and it gets to the point I need to launch the well Launcher and there is where the "Virus" problem comes in.
"Heroes get remembered, but Legends never die" Did they just reference Panic at the disco emperor's new clothes
Ahaha, not quite! It's a quote from the movie 'The Sandlot' but it also pops up in many other places!
Um.... Aurelion sol isn't coming up in my shop... Neither is the login screen for him... I don't know what to do, or how to fix this. It's just an issue...

Same here. Just played two 5v5s, nobody else had access to him either. So it's affecting at least twenty people.

Wait, that's not right. I could have played two separate games with the same nine other people, and you could have been in the game both times, so the minimum we can be SURE that it is affecting is ten.

Hooray for pedantry!
Especially since he was supposed to be released in this patch. I'm not extremely upset at Riot, just a little sad that I can't get him ='(
Aurelion Sol was in the Patch but he hasn't been unlocked as of yet. We'll make an announcement in League News when he is available though, so keep your eyes out for him.

I don't have any sort of connection problem as far as I can tell. I've used speedtest.net and beta.speedtest.net to test my connection, I've downloaded other games, no problems. But every time I try to patch League today, it stops at 33%, begins scanning files, and then at about 1000, tells me that an unspecified error has occurred. A couple times, it has supposedly gotten through the entire patch, but once finished, tells me an unspecified error has occurred. Once I click that away, I have the orange launch button, but it does absolutely nothing.
I've got issues with my league launcher, it keeps scanning files but upon scanning them it starts off at 33% and scans files for a considerably long amount of time and doesn't do anything.

I am having  problem where i micro disconnect from the server, i checked my ping it was 80 to 92 and the fps was over 200. it is really frustrating .
it looks like lag but its not i am just not getting my input into the riot server.

I took a read of your post, and it appears that this is actually some sort of weird connection issue.  When the Launch button turns grey like that, it is waiting to display the ToU or EULA for you to accept.  Since it never appears (and therefore you can't accept it), the button remains grey.  Given that sometimes it also immediately pops up when you launch makes it seem like it isn't getting the command to appear when it should.

In an effort to resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It should have the steps that resolves this issue.

So after i updated to patch 6.6 i launch a game and a error pops up saying
 **" An essential game asser was not found when loading the game: MasterYi         Please try reinstalling the game. A guide to help you reinstall should open automatically after closing this window, Or, please visit support.riotgames.com for additional help."
**
So let me remind you that i started a ranked game and now i have a loss in ranked and possibly going to get reported alot because of this stupid error and might get banned....

Hmm...this is definitely not a common error.  Was this the first and only time that you experienced it?  Or has this happened consistently before?  

Reply back and let us know!

The Space Dragon was released into the Client but hasn't been unlocked for players as of yet. We'll make an announcement when he's released into the Rift for players to enjoy. By enjoy we mean destroy others with star fury.
When I click the league icon on my desktop, it immediately says ";PvP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working." Then it tells me to close the program. Please I need help.

Patcher Kernel Errors usually pop up when there is some sort of OS Permissions Issue.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to read/open files found on your installation, but the OS is blocking it from doing so.  In order to get this fixed, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).  They may seem kind of simple, but they should resolve this.

Having issues patching...stuck at either 0% or 33% scanning files and then suddenly an unspecified error occurs. Tried all the fixes, repaired, checked firewall and internet connection. Everything appears alright on my end. I've got the logs but I'm not sure where I should put them.

> [{quoted}](name=Bxttxrs,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eUQAfWAK,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-03-23T17:51:51.714+0000)

> Having issues patching...stuck at either 0% or 33% scanning files and then suddenly an unspecified error occurs. Tried all the fixes, repaired, checked firewall and internet connection. Everything appears alright on my end. I've got the logs but I'm not sure where I should put them.


Sounds like the client may be having a problem connecting to the Server. Try running through our KB and let us know if the problem persists: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues Also, make sure to run through all the steps. They may seem trivial but the smallest thing could be the issue.
